scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix dashboard && npm install --prefix proxy-bridge
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix dashboard" "npm run dev --prefix proxy-bridge" "npm run electron:dev"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix dashboard && npm run build --prefix proxy-bridge && electron-builder
scripts.electron:dev: npm run build --prefix dashboard && concurrently "npm run dev --prefix dashboard" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && electron ."
